gameview.kIView

Class AKIBrain

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameview.kIView.AKIBrain
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    KIHardBrain, KIKevinBrain

    public abstract class AKIBrain
extends java.lang.Object
    The AKIBrain is used to compute every move of the KI. There are serveral classes which implant this Abstract class and thereby are fully useable KI's
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Jasper S.
